-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Json Quasiquatation library for Haskell.
--   
--   JSON quasiquatation library for Haskell.
--   
--   This package only expose functionality so quasiquoters for different
--   JSON-libraries can more easily be constructed.
--   
--   See <tt>text-json-qq</tt> and <tt>aeson-qq</tt> for libraries that are
--   based on json-qq.
@package json-qq
@version 0.4.1


-- | This package expose the parser <tt>jsonParser</tt>.
--   
--   Only developers that develop new json quasiquoters should use this
--   library!
--   
--   See <tt>text-json-qq</tt> and <tt>aeson-qq</tt> for usage.
module Data.JSON.QQ
data JsonValue
JsonNull :: JsonValue
JsonString :: String -> JsonValue
JsonNumber :: Bool -> Rational -> JsonValue
JsonObject :: [(HashKey, JsonValue)] -> JsonValue
JsonArray :: [JsonValue] -> JsonValue
JsonIdVar :: String -> JsonValue
JsonBool :: Bool -> JsonValue
JsonCode :: Exp -> JsonValue
data HashKey
HashVarKey :: String -> HashKey
HashStringKey :: String -> HashKey
parsedJson :: String -> Either ParseError JsonValue
